title: Interpretation of a fat woman in a dream: Seeing a fat girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a fat woman in a dreamSeeing a fat girl in a dreamSeeing a woman I know in a dreamInterpretation of obesity in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a beautiful woman in a dreamI dreamed that I was fat in a dreamSeeing an unknown woman in a dreamThe unknown woman in a single woman’s dreamA woman in a dream generally symbolizes the world and its joys, and the interpretation is praiseworthy, what She wasn't ugly looking or skinny. We wish everyone an enjoyable and useful continuation of this topic. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a man’s dream Obesity in the interpretation is an increase in money, and a woman’s obesity particularly indicates honor and generosity. If a man sees in his dream that he has married a fat woman, then he will gain an important matter in this world, this indicates To increase good deeds, because a woman who eats indicates the intensity of spending and is desirable in interpretation. A fat woman looks beautiful in a dream, because then it expresses a happy world and a happy life. A fat woman in a man’s dream indicates the world, and if he sees her heading towards him or sees her kissing him, he may witness in his world the best of what he wants. A fat or obese woman in a man’s dream is better From skinny women. If the former expresses prosperity, happiness, or well-being, the latter indicates suffering and unhappiness. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in one’s dream: A fat woman in a dream of an unmarried girl or girl indicates a blessed year with joyful and happy events, and she is praiseworthy in the interpretation if she appears smiling. And beautiful, it is also praiseworthy if an unplanned future presents itself. A fat woman in one’s dream denotes grace, kindness, and acceptance. If he sees a woman in his dream taking food or a gift from a fat woman, this is a good interpretation and her gift in this context indicates a desire that can be fulfilled. The dream in this context shows accepting something or something in which is good, and it is also praiseworthy for a woman to hug One fat woman knows, because such visions indicate achieving goals or achieving goals. An obese woman, if she sees an unmarried woman dead, is interpreted as a wasted year. Interpretation of seeing a fat woman in a married dream: A fat or obese woman has many connotations in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of prosperity, growth, and increased income. If a married woman dreams that her husband is marrying a fat woman, then in waking life she may obtain a great benefit, and it is worthy of praise in the interpretation that the fat woman in a married woman’s dream is known or close, because if she knew. By name, its meaning can give a positive signal in a dream. If a married woman dreams that she is fighting or chasing a fat woman, this means a struggle with the world. If a married woman sees in her dream as if a fat woman entered her house, this indicates grace, blessing, and the goodness of fat people in Her beautiful dreams, because they are an expression of luck or luck. Interpretation of a fat woman in a pregnant dream: The most important meaning of a fat woman in a dream is the blessing of good deeds or their increase. Therefore, an obese woman in a dream is pregnant

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a newborn baby for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new baby for a married woman: A woman sees many dreams in her dreams, and sometimes she does not care about them, and at other times she wants to know what they indicate, including a dream about a male baby, whose signs we will learn in light of what it brought. By the great dream interpreters, so follow this topic with us. Interpretation of a dream about a male child: Seeing a male child in a dream varies in its interpretation from one case to another, and what is known among interpreters is that a male child in a dream is one of the visions that indicate worries and suffering, but it also has Negatively. The face, must have a positive side, and these faces are revealed through the details of the vision. What does a good vision indicate: It is said that if a woman is pregnant and sees a male child, she can give birth to a female, and it may be a sign of a married woman who did not give birth or was expecting a child That she will soon carry her fetus in the womb and be happy with the pregnancy. A pregnant woman who is at the beginning of her pregnancy and does not know her gender yet will give birth to this boy in reality. Whoever sees this vision in his dream and has suffered from debts or crises in his life, he will soon have good luck and will be able to pay off his debts. If one finds a male child on his way, and this child is good-looking, then the vision brings good news to the dreamer of abundant goodness that will come to him and change his life for the better. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. What does a bad vision indicate: Agrees Many interpreters say that the presence of a male child in the dreamer indicates many crises that he is going through in his life, which may reach the point of misfortunes. If the woman is sick and sees this vision when she is not pregnant in the first place, then her due date may have come. If an unmarried girl sees her male child, she will face difficulties and adversity in achieving her goals, and if she is a student, she will fail in her studies and then she may return to her level after a while. A woman who gives birth A male child in her dream means that she is burdened with worries and sorrows and is suffering from many problems with her husband, and this may indicate that the husband will suffer a great loss in his work. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a male child by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a male child in the dreamer’s dream carries many connotations and may be a sign of... Fatigue and difficulty that the dreamer suffers from in his life. If a girl sees her while she is in the study stage, she will face obstacles on her way. She may not pass some tests, but in the end she will strive and succeed. As for the woman she sees in her dream and gets married, she has been harmed by her husband’s family, but the husband It will be a reason to bring them closer together and work to improve their relationship with each other. A woman who has not given birth and sees a newborn in her dream may mean that it is good news for the dreamer that she will find a solution to the problem of pregnancy and she will soon give birth to a child that will bring joy and happiness to her. Family spirits. Ibn Sirin said: An unmarried girl who sees a baby in her dream, and the baby is female, is good news for a good husband. In her life, or she falls victim to a person known for his bad reputation, which brings him

title: Interpretation of a dream about oranges

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream. Oranges are one of the most delicious fruits that people love, and they are not only characterized by their delicious taste, but also have many health benefits. Therefore, the color orange in a dream has a large number of positive meanings that deserve praise in most places. Oranges in a dream, but with the warning that no interpretation can be rejected. We will introduce it to any other vision when there is a need to interpret a vision. A dream interpretation scholar is consulted until the interpretation of the vision is clear and accurate, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for someone: An unmarried young man who sees in a dream that he is picking oranges, it is possible that this is the person for whom he will marry - God willing - soon. He also says Imam Ibn Sirin said that oranges in a dream come from people in general and affect the physical health of the dreamer from God. I know. In addition, the color orange in the dream indicates that there is good and wonderful food that the opinion will gain in the coming period - God willing - and God knows best. Just like Oranges in a dream, this indicates wealth - God willing - and lawful food. As for the person who dreams that he is sleeping on a large pile of oranges, this is one of the unpleasant dreams that may indicate the presence of a relative who saved his life, and God knows best. Seeing oranges in a dream for a married manMarried man He dreams that he is eating oranges, as this is one of the bad dreams that may indicate illness, God forbid. But to see an orange in a dream that is in good condition, this is one of the good signs that indicate goodness and success for the married man - God willing - in addition to seeing oranges in a dream with a smell. Beautiful and wonderful, this is one of the unpleasant dreams of a married person, which indicates the loss of trade, which is the first letter of evil, and God knows best. Seeing oranges in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees oranges in a dream, this is a sign that she will find the happiness she is looking for. Just as we dream of oranges during the winter, this is one of the dreams that shows the activity and positivity that one girl has. In addition to the unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is peeling oranges, this indicates the good feelings that the girl feels towards someone. As for the girl An unmarried woman who sees someone giving her an orange, this indicates the affection and love that unites them, and God knows best. Seeing oranges in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in a dream that she is eating oranges, this indicates that she will obtain many benefits from one of her relatives - God willing -. Like a married woman who sees someone giving her an orange. In her dream, she is eating oranges and the taste is good and delicious. This portends the good news that she will receive - God willing - in the coming season. In addition, oranges in a married woman’s dream can symbolize the death of worries and problems and the psychological comfort that the woman will feel - completely, God willing. Like picking oranges in a dream at an inappropriate time, this indicates the presence of...

In addition, oranges in a married woman’s dream can symbolize the death of worries and problems and the psychological comfort that the woman will feel - completely, God willing. Like picking oranges in a dream at an inappropriate time, this indicates the presence of...

title: What is the interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream A pigeon’s nest in a dream refers to many symbols, most of which relate to social relationships and the individual’s ability to form new relationships. It can be expressed by children if he is married or his close friends if he is a single young man, and there are still many interpretations that are expressed by seeing a pigeon’s nest, and this is followed by different details of the dream. Interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream What is the interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream? If the dreamer He suffers from loneliness and the inability to communicate with others due to a feeling of lack or lack of confidence for some reason, so he finds someone who comes to him asking for his friendship and slowly gets used to communicating and dealing with the rest. If he sees a dove laying eggs in his dream, a happy event will happen soon, either he will get married if he He is single or his wife will give birth to a beautiful child if he is married. A dove protecting its young in the nest from the danger of a hunter is a sign that the dreamer is a responsible person who does everything he can for his children and wife. As for an unmarried woman, seeing it expresses her happiness in the coming days. The coming is the result of achieving a certain goal, whether in personal life, work, or study. If the nest is full of young people, then there are goals and ambitions that the dreamer wants to achieve, but they will not happen overnight, but rather take a longer time. What is the interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Pigeons building nests is a good sign that the dreamer is fulfilling his responsibilities towards the people in his home and that he is someone who can be relied upon in times of adversity. If he sees that insects have filled the nest and he is not ready or suitable to place pigeons in it, then he knows that there are tense relations between him and his life partner or Work and he needs some peace. In dealing with the problems that have arisen between them recently until things return to normal. Ibn Sirin said that the large nest is a sign of the prosperity and luxury in which he will live in the coming period, because of the large amounts of money he earns from his work or trade. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Website Egyptian Dream Interpretation from Google. Interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who is still in school or university. Her vision expresses her feeling of stability within the confines of her family, which protects and defends her in all the situations she faces. However, if the woman reaches the age of one, she is thinking Currently in marriage and there may be an opportunity for her to enter into a new emotional relationship with a young man who she believes suits her and is compatible with her, but the matter still needs to be careful and cautious so as not to reap regret from this relationship. A spoiled nest is a sign that this young man is completely inappropriate and must To stay away from him immediately before he is exposed to serious harm. If you find the two pigeons preparing for the nest and passionately following what they are doing, it will become clear that soon they will be officially linked to a distinguished young man and a man worthy of them, capable of taking responsibility. Interpretation of a pigeon’s nest in a dream for a married woman. Many commentators have indicated that A dove's nest indicates the imminent fulfillment of one's desire

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing teeth by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out: Teeth are incisors in the mouth of a living being that it uses to chew food, and their loss is often accompanied by blood and pain for many people, so the dream of losing teeth makes the dreamer feel afraid of the consequences accompanying it, and in the following lines of the article we will explain in detail the interpretations related to this The dream. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out: Anyone who sees his teeth falling out in a dream, this leads to the loss of a lot of money, so if he enters a new venture or venture, he must plan it well so that he does not regret it later. And if during your sleep you see white teeth falling out, this is a sign that he will receive some compensation or return his complaint and justice will be given to him from heaven. Ibn Shaheen - may God have mercy on him - explained that if a person suffers from accumulated debts in reality, and sees in his dream that one of his teeth is falling out Without blood, this is evidence that God Almighty will do so. It makes him earn money that enables him to pay off his debts and live in a state of contentment and comfort. And if you see in a dream your teeth falling into your lap, this indicates your ability to achieve your goals, fulfill your desires and enjoy a long life. Interpretation of a dream about losing teeth by Ibn Sirin, explained by the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may he have mercy on him. God - seeing teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes the death of someone close to him in the first place. If a woman sees that her teeth are falling out during sleep, her male relative will be exposed to an emergency. Feeling the pain of losing teeth in a dream proves that the dreamer is exposed to a difficult situation or crisis and must To be patient until God relieves his distress. And if you see in a dream that you are deliberately pulling out your tooth, this is a sign that you have severed kinship ties. Whoever sees during his sleep that his teeth fall out when using a toothpick, this is a sign of a quarrel or quarrel between him and someone soon. Interpretation of a dream about losing Teeth for Nabulsi Sheikh Nabulsi said in his interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream that it is a sign that the dreamer will enjoy a long life unlike those of the same age. And if someone sees his teeth falling out in his dream, this is evidence of his travel abroad and away from his family or the death of his family members before him. Vision Teeth falling on your arm, sleeve, or chest in a dream is a better indicator than falling on the ground. It is also better for the dreamer to see his teeth after they have fallen than if they were invisible. Interpretation of a dream about losing teeth for a single woman: If a girl dreams of one of her teeth falling out, this indicates the atmosphere The stable in which she lives with her family members and the strength of the relationship and connection between them. Seeing an unmarried woman with her teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes the bad psychological state she is going through in her life at this time due to her facing some problems and obstacles. If a girl sees during her sleep that one of her teeth has fallen out and feels pain, This is a sign of the death of a loved one, control, and depression for a long time. For an unmarried woman to dream of all her teeth falling out in a dream, this indicates her failure to achieve her desires and goals in life, which makes her feel uncomfortable and uneasy.

title: Interpretation of seeing a sinking ship in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a ship sinking in a dream or a dream. A ship is a means of transportation that travels on water, sea water, or a river. Seeing a ship on water shows freedom from worry, anxiety, and knowledge. Some other interpretations that may indicate evil, such as a ship moving through the air, which indicates death, and we will explain that in detail in this article: the interpretation of seeing a ship sinking in a dream for a married man and a single, married young man. A woman, a girl, a pregnant woman, a divorcee, and a widow, and by displaying the interpretations of major interpreters of visions and dreams such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a ship sinking in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a ship in a dream indicates freedom from worry and anxiety. Seeing a ship at sea in Dream of a non-believer professing Islam. Seeing a ship in a stormy and sinful sea indicates repentance from sins. Seeing a ship for a sick person indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing a ship at sea for the poor indicates wealth and riches. Seeing a shipwreck It indicates salvation from financial distress. What is the interpretation of a dream about a large ship? See For a single person, buying a large ship indicates his marriage. Seeing yourself holding the oar of a ship indicates gaining knowledge. Seeing death on a ship indicates freedom from anxiety and torment in the future. What is the interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a small ship in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates To achieve what you want and get rid of anxiety. Seeing a ship for a girl who has never been married indicates obedience and good worship. Seeing a ship flood indicates the girl’s upcoming marriage. What is the interpretation of a dream about riding a ship with someone? Seeing a picnic with someone indicates a business partnership. Seeing a ship In the salty sea, it announces spoils. Seeing a ship running in the air predicts the death of the dreamer. Driving and directing a ship indicates occupying a leadership position. What is the interpretation of a dream about driving a ship for a married woman? Seeing a ship for a married woman indicates good offspring. If a married woman sees that she is on a ship, it indicates her freedom from worry and misery. Riding a boat indicates repentance for sins. If a married woman is seen bidding farewell to her husband while he is on the ship, it indicates profit and money. What is the interpretation of a dream about driving a ship with the family? Seeing a boat with the family indicates safety, security, and escape from danger. A vision of a black ship, did not Only ropes remain of it, which indicates that the work does not take away from it, so it is a trust. What is the interpretation of the ship by Ibn Shaheen? Whoever sees that he is in the ship, he will be in distress, distress, or strife. And whoever sees that he is building a ship and installing it indicates his marriage, and the ship in the dream of a single person indicates his marriage. Seeing yourself getting out of the ship indicates freedom from adversity. Seeing Noah’s Ark means freedom from worries and dangers. What is the interpretation of the ship in Nabulsi? Seeing a ship on land indicates freedom from worry and anxiety. Seeing the ship being towed indicates hypocrisy. Seeing yourself riding a boat with The righteous signifies guidance and justice. Whoever dreams that he died on a ship in the middle of the water, foretells his death at the hands of men, and he will die with honor and well-being. Seeing a shipwreck means bad luck. We are happy that

title: Interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the scorpion is a poisonous creature that can cause death to a person if it succeeds in stinging it. Scorpion sting. This dream is one of the disturbing and annoying dreams that make the dreamer feel that there is danger surrounding him, and in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scorpion sting in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The famous interpreter scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin believes that seeing The thorn that a scorpion uses to sting is a symbol of a person who adopts gossip as a way of life. A sting in a dream is also a sign of making money, but this money will not last long, and will quickly dissipate, God forbid. Interpretation of dreams to see a scorpion sting in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation will not differ. On the authority of Ibn Sirin, in interpreting the scorpion sting, he said that it is a sign of evil and harm that will befall the fortuneteller in reality, and the extent of the harm will be the extent of the harm. Due to the severity of the sting he suffered in a dream. Seeing a scorpion sting in a dream varies depending on its location. If the dreamer stings a scorpion on his hand, then seeing it is a sign of envy that he will find in reality, God forbid, at work or business. And if the dreamer feels that he will die in his dream as a result of this bite, then this is a sign of cunning and deception that will be revealed in his life. Commentators confirm that seeing scorpions gathering in The dream is a sign that enemies are gathering to harm the dreamer, and he must be very careful with those around him. As for the bite, if it is in the dreamer’s leg or on his leg, it is a sign of the harm that he will be exposed to in this world, God forbid, so he should approach God Almighty, and take advantage of it in Overcoming what he is exposed to. For him. A scorpion sting on his chest is a sign of harm that will affect his psychological well-being and turn him into an evil and shameful person in life, God forbid. A scorpion in a dream is one of the dreams that portends danger in some cases and has many different interpretations, and interpreters have been careful to take it into consideration. To reduce the ambiguity that these dreams pose in the mind of the viewer after waking up from sleep.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a small snake: Seeing a small snake in a dream

preview.html: A small snake in a dream generally indicates the presence of enemies, but there are other visions such as small black, green, white, or colored snakes, a small snake entering the house, a small snake biting, eating snake meat, or killing it. A small snake. We will explain it to you for the unmarried girl, the married girl, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man from the great dream interpreters Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others: Interpretation of a small snake in a dream. Seeing small snakes can have a happy meaning for a married woman, which is that she will become pregnant and then give birth. Small snakes in a dream indicate a problem or worries. Transient and money appears if it climbs on the furniture of the house or crawls over it, and it appears to children if they are on the bed or on the mattress. Small snakes often show the cunning of women if they are colored. The small snake shows the young boy, and if the Sultan catches snakes, he deceives his enemies and conquers them. If you see a snake Small in a dream, this indicates the presence of a child or children. Seeing a small snake in a dream means that the dreamer is among the corrupt people with bad intentions and a bad heart. In general, seeing a small snake in a dream indicates bad people, and therefore no matter how good the people are in his life, in The first opportunity he will see from them is treachery and evil. Seeing small black snakes in a dream means that the visionary will excel in his work and occupy a good position among his enemies and competitors. Interpretation of a small snake in a dream: It indicates an enemy that has no power and indicates people who will cause you fatigue and suffering in life. If You saw a small snake in a dream, this indicates that your enemy does not have the ability to harm you and this enemy will always seek to harm you. Whoever sees a small snake in his dream means that the fortuneteller will make a great effort in your life to achieve what you want and you will not get anything easily. According to some scholars, Whoever sees a small snake in a dream indicates the enemy, who is small and short in stature, from whom you will see harm. This vision is interpreted in different ways according to some scholars: This vision shows the enemy that you do not see, that is, this enemy appears to be your friend, but in reality he is He feels jealous and envious of you. But sometimes this vision is interpreted by wants and desires that are still in the dreamer’s mind and have not yet been fulfilled. If you see a small snake in your dream, this indicates a leader, business manager, employee, head of the family, or something similar. Interpretation of a bite Small snake in a dream A disc snake in a dream shows the presence of evil people in the dreamer’s life, but they will not be able to do anything except disturb his mood and upset him because they are trying to hurt him with words only, which means they cannot do anything. But talk. The bite of a small snake in a dream indicates that someone is talking about him and trying to harm him in every way, but they will not be able to harm him. Interpretation of catching a small snake in a dream Catching a small snake in a dream means liberating the dreamer from all the restrictions that he set for himself in previous periods and overcoming on
